name: MindValley Hispano Any Page Embed
author: David Castillo

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to take any page from the internet and embed it in a
wordpress page.
Ideal for people who have a wordpress setup for their whole site as CMS but
they need landing pages that are out of the theme structure.
sections.installation:
Best is to install directly from WordPress.
If manual installation is required, please make sure all of the plugin files are in a folder named “MVHispano-any-page-embed” (not two nested folders) in the plugin directory.

short_description: Embed any page of the internet on your wordpress blog without the theme affecting how it looks and not iframing it
description:
